references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: P. R. J. Asveld, Fibonacci-like differential equations with a polynomial nonhomogeneous term, Fib. Quart. 27 (1989), 303-309.
INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 511
maple: ZL:=[S, {a = Atom, b = Atom, S = Prod(X,Sequence(Prod(X,b))), X = Sequence(b,card >= 1)}, labelled]: seq(combstruct[count](ZL, size=n), n=0..18); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 26 2008
author: _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Dec 24 1999
